RumorFact.Text: I've arrived in Hearth's Neighbor. The only immediately obvious feature in this system is a lone, dusty planet.

ExploreFact.Text: Hearth's Neighbor's sole planet. The surface is devoid of life.
I found some kind of elevator that went below the surface and emerged in a strange expansive area. Is this planet <color=FF6E2B>bigger on the inside?</color>?

RumorFact.Text: There is a strange domed structure on the surface of Lonely Hermit.

ExploreFact.Text: There does not seem to be a way inside. Judging by the copious amounts of Ghost Matter leaking out of it, it may not be a good idea to go inside it regardless.
A mural indicates that this structure is built around a comet that once crashed into the planet. The planet's inhabitants harnessed a power from within the comet to fuel their civilization.

RumorFact.Text: There appears to be some snow-covered mountains at the north pole.

AltText.Text: At the north pole, there are small remnants of civilization.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a functioning elevator in the wasteland.

RumorFact.Text: There appears to be a tall, hollow mountain close to the south pole.

AltText.Text: A long-extinct volcano exists on the surface.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a functioning elevator on a structure within the caldera of the volcano.

RumorFact.Text: There is a large structure surrounded by a moat.

AltText.Text: A strange structure exists surrounded by a moat. Despite the water, the area does not have any signs of life.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a functioning elevator within the structure.

The structure has some kind of landing/launching pad for larger ships. The pad is connected to a large hangar of some kind where the inhabitants of this planet stored resources to build a much larger structure.

RumorFact.Text: There is a massive locked door in the hangar.

ExploreFact.Text: Behind the door was a floating satellite pointing at something in space. There is a signal coming out of it.
